name: Silent Night 12x20 Pillow Cover in Black
description: As seen in last year's Better Homes and Gardens Christmas Ideas Magazine This pillow cover is made from a 100% cotton fabric in the color "natural linen". It has the phrase "Silent Night" printed on it in a black ink. The pillow cover is made to fit a 12 by 20 inch pillow form. Silent Night was written in freehand first and then scanned in and burned onto a silk screen and then printed onto the pillow. Please note that this is a freehanded script and not a computerized font so therefore it isn't "perfect." Also, the natural fabric that we use has lots of different "imperfections" to it. This is part of the fabric and not considered a mistake. It is part of what I love so much about this particular fabric and I have used it all throughout my home as I love this natural look. Because all of our products are handmade, items may not be perfectly identical. However, the photo does closely represent the product. All Dear Lillie items come with a beautiful hang tag and are wrapped in tissue closed together with a Dear Lillie sticker. It makes a lovely gift!

name: His Name Shall Be 24x36 Chalkboard Download
description: Download this sized-to-print PDF. It is sized to print at 24"x36". Have it printed at your local print shop and you have instant art! For an inexpensive option we recommend an engineering style print that generally costs around $3 at office supply stores. Once downloaded, it can be printed as many times as you would like! Please keep in mind this was handwritten with a chalk pen and therefore has all the nuances that come with a handwritten piece of chalk art. No lines are "perfect" or "perfectly straight." You can put it in a frame of your own or make one using this tutorial or if you would just like to back it you can use our tutorial on making a quick and easy poster (For this method the edges are folded over the back and therefore the finished product size is slightly smaller than the 24 by 36). THESE ITEMS ARE FOR PERSONAL USE ONLY AND ALTHOUGH YOU ARE ALLOWED TO PRINT AS MANY COPIES AS YOU WOULD LIKE AT ANY PRINT SHOP, THIS ARTWORK IS NOT TO BE SOLD OR REDISTRIBUTED IN ANY MANNER. Don't be thrown off by the "Coming Soon," just click "Download," submit your information, and you will be automatically sent an email with your download link.

name: 'Twas the Night Before Christmas Thermal
description: As all of us at Dear Lillie are avid readers and love literature we like to incorporate some of our favorite lines and quotes onto our screenprinted designs. This black thermal shirt has the whole "Twas the Night Before Christmas" poem written out on it in white and gray ink: Twas the night before Christmas when all through the house, Not a creature was stirring, not even a mouse; The stockings were hung by the chimney with care, In hopes that St. Nicholas soon would be there; The children were nestled all snug in their beds, While visions of sugar-plums danced in their heads; And mamma in her 'kerchief, and I in my cap, Had just settled down for a long winter's nap, When out on the lawn there arose such a clatter, I sprang from the bed to see what was the matter. Away to the window I flew like a flash, Tore open the shutters and threw up the sash. The moon on the breast of the new-fallen snow Gave the lustre of mid-day to objects below, When, what to my wondering eyes should appear, But a miniature sleigh, and eight tiny reindeer, With a little old driver, so lively and quick, I knew in a moment it must be St. Nick. More rapid than eagles his coursers they came, And he whistled, and shouted, and called them by name; "Now, Dasher! now, Dancer! now, Prancer and Vixen! On, Comet! on Cupid! on, Donder and Blitzen! To the top of the porch! to the top of the wall! Now dash away! dash away! dash away all!" As dry leaves that before the wild hurricane fly, When they meet with an obstacle, mount to the sky, So up to the house-top the coursers they flew, With the sleigh full of toys, and St. Nicholas too. And then, in a twinkling, I heard on the roof , The prancing and pawing of each little hoof. As I drew in my head, and was turning around, Down the chimney St. Nicholas came with a bound. He was dressed all in fur, from his head to his foot, And his clothes were all tarnished with ashes and soot; A bundle of toys he had flung on his back, And he looked like a peddler just opening his pack. His eyes -- how they twinkled! his dimples how merry! His cheeks were like roses, his nose like a cherry! His droll little mouth was drawn up like a bow, And the beard of his chin was as white as the snow; The stump of a pipe he held tight in his teeth, And the smoke it encircled his head like a wreath; He had a broad face and a little round belly, That shook, when he laughed like a bowlful of jelly. He was chubby and plump, a right jolly old elf, And I laughed when I saw him, in spite of myself; A wink of his eye and a twist of his head, Soon gave me to know I had nothing to dread; He spoke not a word, but went straight to his work, And filled all the stockings; then turned with a jerk, and laying his finger aside of his nose, And giving a nod, up the chimney he rose; He sprang to his sleigh, to his team gave a whistle, And away they all flew like the down of a thistle. But I heard him exclaim, ere he drove out of sight, "Happy Christmas to all, and to all a good-night." This shirt was hand screen printed in a gray and white ink on a thermal long sleeve black shirt. These shirts are extremely comfortable and ultra soft. PLEASE NOTE - The onesie sizes are not thermals. They are made from a fine baby rib material. Also, they are just $14.95 *Photos 1 and 2 courtesy of Jlyn Photography All Dear Lillie items come with a beautiful hang tag and are wrapped in tissue closed together with a Dear Lillie sticker. It makes a lovely gift!

name: Nest 14x14 Pillow Cover
description:
<FONT COLOR="#FF0000" size="2">COLOR MOST ACCURATELY REPRESENTED IN MAIN PRODUCT PICTURE</font>

This pillow cover is made from a 100% cotton fabric in the color "natural linen". It has a brown nest with cream eggs and the word "nest." The pillow cover is made to fit a 14 by 14 inch pillow form.

Also, the natural fabric that we use has lots of different "imperfections" to it. This is part of the fabric and not considered a mistake. It is part of what I love so much about this particular fabric and I have used it all throughout my home as I love this natural look.

All Dear Lillie items come with a beautiful hang tag and are wrapped in tissue closed together with a Dear Lillie sticker. It makes a lovely gift!

This pillow cover is made from a burlap fabric. It features the date "1776" framed by a laurel wreath in a black print. The pillow cover is made to fit an 18 by 18 inch pillow form.

The images were burned onto a silk screen and then printed onto the pillows.

PLEASE NOTE - These pillow covers are made to fit 18x18 pillow forms, but I like to stuff them with 20x20 inserts to make them look extra full and plump.

Because all of our products are handmade, items may not be perfectly identical. However, the photo does closely represent the product.

All Dear Lillie items come with a beautiful hang tag and are wrapped in tissue closed together with a Dear Lillie sticker. It makes a lovely gift!

name: Hope Is 18x18 Pillow Cover
description:
This pillow cover is made from a 100% cotton fabric in the color "natural linen". It has the phrase "Hope is the thing with feathers" by Emily Dickinson and features our signature bird cage design printed in a black ink. The pillow cover is made to fit an 18 by 18 inch pillow form.

The images were burned onto a silk screen and then printed onto the pillows.

Also, the natural fabric that we use has lots of different "imperfections" to it. This is part of the fabric and not considered a mistake. It is part of what I love so much about this particular fabric and I have used it all throughout my home as I love this natural look. 

PLEASE NOTE - These pillow covers are made to fit 18x18 pillow forms, but I like to stuff them with 20x20 inserts to make them look extra full and plump.

Because all of our products are handmade, items may not be perfectly identical. However, the photo does closely represent the product.

All Dear Lillie items come with a beautiful hang tag and are wrapped in tissue closed together with a Dear Lillie sticker. It makes a lovely gift!

name: Jane Austen Silhouette Cardstock Set
description:
Check out our cardstock decorations! These large, medium, or small Jane Austen silhouettes can be used for a multitude of projects. They can be framed or added to cards or gifts or you can punch a hole in them and hang them.

The small silhouettes (approximately 2.5" tall) are available in black or cream and come in sets of eight.

The medium silhouettes (approximately 4.5" tall) are available in black or cream and come in sets of four.

The large silhouettes (approximately 9" tall) are available in black or cream and come in sets of two.

PLEASE NOTE - We are only selling the actual silhouettes, not the frame in pictures 1 and 2 or the banner in picture 1 and 3. This item comes wrapped slightly different than our other items.

name: Girl with Pram Cardstock Silhouette Set
description:
Check out our cardstock decorations! These black Girl with Pram silhouettes can be used for a multitude of projects. They can be framed or added to cards or gifts. These silhouettes are approximately 6.5 inches wide and 5.5 inches tall and are sold in sets of two. They come in a small box tied with a ribbon and make a great gift!

PLEASE NOTE - This item comes wrapped slightly different than our other items.

name: His Name Shall Be 11x14 Chalkboard Print
description:
Order this high quality print and when it arrives just pop it into a frame for instant "chalkboard" art. This has been professionally printed on a heavy-weight cardstock and is sized at 11" by 14" and is printed with a full bleed. Please keep in mind this was originally handwritten with a chalk pen and therefore has all the nuances that come with a handwritten piece of chalk art. No lines are "perfect" or "perfectly straight."

name: Chocolate Thanksgiving Download Pack
description: PDF File Includes: Pilgrim Girl and Boy Menu Cards Pilgrim Girl and Boy Menu Cards with Verse Pilgrim Girl and Boy Food Labels Pilgrim Boy Placecards Pilgrim Girl Placecards Maple Leaves Template (to trace and cut out) This package includes the above items and is made to be downloaded on your computer and then printed on 8.5" by 11" cardstock. name: Love Is 18x18 Pillow Cover Set
description:
These pillow covers are made from a 100% cotton fabric in the color "natural linen". One cover has the phrase "love is patient and kind" and the other has "love never fails" printed in a black ink. The pillow covers are made to fit an 18 by 18 inch pillow form. These would make a great wedding or anniversary gift!

The scripts were written in freehand first and then scanned in and burned onto a silk screen and then printed onto the pillows. Please note that this is a freehanded script and not a computerized font so therefore it isn't "perfect." 

Also, the natural fabric that we use has lots of different "imperfections" to it. This is part of the fabric and not considered a mistake. It is part of what I love so much about this particular fabric and I have used it all throughout my home as I love this natural look. 

PLEASE NOTE - These pillow covers are made to fit 18x18 pillow forms, but I like to stuff them with 20x20 inserts to make them look extra full and plump.

Because all of our products are handmade, items may not be perfectly identical. However, the photo does closely represent the product.

All Dear Lillie items come with a beautiful hang tag and are wrapped in tissue closed together with a Dear Lillie sticker. It makes a lovely gift!
